sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'; import CardActions from '@material-ui/core/CardActions'; import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import netCoreLogo from './Resources/netCore.svg'; import postgresLogo from './Resources/postgresql.svg'; import reactLogo from './Resources/react.svg'; import muiLogo from './Resources/materialUi.svg' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ redirectButton: { marginBottom: '10px', marginLeft: '10px', width: "10rem", }, mainCard: { margin: '0 auto', marginTop: '32px', display: 'block', maxWidth: 850, "& p": { textAlign: 'justify', marginBottom: '16px' } }, cards: { display: 'flex', }, innerCard: { background: '#fdfdfd', width: '99%', margin: '0 5px', "& p": { color: 'black', fontWeight: 550 }, '& span': { color: '#2d2d2d', marginLeft: '6px', }, '& img': { width: '90px', height: '90px' } }, techBox: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-around', '& div': { margin: '0 15px' }, "& p": { margin: '0', textAlign: 'center' } } })); const StartPage = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
Human Resources Manager A complex prototype application. To store employees data, and assign tasks to them. Application content is depends of a employee permissions. The main roles of employees are: a regular employee, team leader,administrator, and HR manager. An ordinary employees can view their tasks and change their status. Tasks for employees are assigned by the team leader in a dedicated view. An employee who manages human resources can add new employees and change their data. It is also responsible for creating new teams. All data in the application is randomly generated by a built-in generator on the backend side. To get started you need to login(button below). Login data for main roles are listed below. After login, application will generate new tasks for employees. This is mainly intended for presentation purposes. This is to simulate the use of applications under normal working conditions. Login Data: Administrator: Login: admin Used Technologies:
Backend:
.Net Core
PostgreSQL
Frontend:
ReactJS
MaterialUI
); } export default StartPage;
